name: Arcane Domains
description:
Welcome to the Arcane Domains!

This is a short, third person beat-em-up game. Take your mage across the map, rescuing wizards, collecting treasure, and fighting enemies as you work to make the domains safe. Each level takes between 3 - 10 minutes to complete. You have 18 spells available to you at the start of the game, with five additional spells to discover. Summon skeletons, launch fireballs, cast lightning, or whatever else you need in order to save the day.

Cast devastating spells on the lizardmen


Visit the vast domains


Use your spellbook


Rescue other wizards to unlock new spells


Find Treasure to help you on your journey


Fight four different bosses


Have a friend help you in split screen co-op
